channel.title: New hoster.. Quickly!
channel.description:
The hoster than i currently have is fuckin everthing up and says the server is 24/7 and it like 1/7 lol.
Anyway.. All i am looking for is a guy/girl who will RUN the source on there computer 24/7. i can give u the IP etc. It willt ake like 5 minutes to setup.
Its a WEBCLIENT so no need for client. And i can just send you the Source.
Msn?
OR JUST PM ME!
